documentation.introduction: There are two millionaires, Alice and Bob. They want to know who is richer, but they don´t want to tell to other millionaire how much money they have. This problem solves Yao´s millionaire protocol.
documentation.usage: This plugin represents Alice. You need to specify for this plugins number Y, maximal ammount of money, random number p and ammount of money of Alice. This plugin waits for all encrypted numbers Y a calculates list of numbers Z.
